articles.content: A big belly is something that's so much easier to put on than it is to lose. It's the place where it goes last for a lot of folks, and the process can be daunting. The most frustrating thing? Many pe… [+3534 chars]

articles.author: John Ely Senior
articles.title: Nationwide sperm shortage means 75% of donated swimmers come from abroad - Daily Mail
articles.description: More needs to be done to encourage British men to donate sperm to stop a nationwide sperm shortage forcing women to rely on operators, including from abroad, with less stringent checks.
articles.content:
British women trying to conceive are having to buy sperm samples from abroad, experts warned today.
Three-quarters of donated sperm used in UK fertility clinics gets shipped in from overseas, like t… [+5699 chars]
